field.name: summary
field.value: NHibernate Facility - DefaultFlushMode not used with Aliased Interceptor

field.name: description
field.value: When a session interceptor is configured with a session factory alias, the configured default flush mode is not set on the session when a new session is created by the DefaultSessionManager.

comment.author: tehlike
comment.text: Fixed in rev 5402 by Jesse Napier
